dsOverview.title: High-Resolution Transmission Molecular Absorption Database (HITRAN), 1986 Edition

summary.p: This dataset contains the 1986 edition of the High-Resolution Transmission Molecular Absorption Database (HITRAN). The database is a compilation of spectroscopic parameters for use in calculating and predicting the transmission and emission of radiation in the atmosphere.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section,Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: DOD/USAF/AFRL > U.S. Air Force Research Laboratory, U.S. Air Force, U. S. Department of Defense

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Radiation > Absorption

reference.authorList: McClatchey, R.A., W.S. Benedict, S.A. Clough, D.E. Burch, R.F. Calfee, K. Fox, L.S. Rothman and J.S. Garing
reference.title: AFCRL Atmospheric Absorption Line Parameters Compilation
reference.organization: Air Force Cambridge Research Laboratories, Bedford, MA
